title: Nice cursive ID
content:
Hi!

Can you ID this nice cursive font for me?

Merci!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [942865\_10151443850606262\_633418170\_n.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017112407/http:/typophile.com/files/942865_10151443850606262_633418170_n.jpg) | 41.56 KB |
author: Shawali

comments.content: [Feel Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017112407/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/feel-script) with alternate / [v](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017112407/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/feel-script/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/520107/861) and / [y](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017112407/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/feel-script/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/520107/912) available through OpenType features.
